attributes.action: mental health and physical health to be treated separately
attributes.additional_details: Mental health and physical health needs to be separated and treated completely different and support needs to be there for mental health sufferers as it is for physical difficulty.. the nhs needs to change its approach and the benefits need to be completely changed to 2 parts of disability claims one for physical health and one for mental health..
attributes.background: When trying to receive support with mental health we are put onto a waiting list without any support where as physical health You will be seen instantly!.. when applying for benefits your forever filling in forms about how far you can walk etc which is irrelevant to mental health.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "mental health and physical health to be treated separately".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
